content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: emerald_block
inventory=[{"type": "chorus_flower", "quantity": 62, "index": 22}, {"type": "emerald", "quantity": 9, "index": 31}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "heavy_weighted_pressure_plate", "quantity": 60, "index": 35}, {"type": "iron_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "nether_gold_ore", "quantity": 57, "index": 38}, {"type": "golden_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 61, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft emerald_block I need to place 9 emeralds in a 3x3 grid. The first step is to move 1 emerald to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now I need to move another emerald to the right of the first emerald (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 2 with quantity 1
